price: Tetapi jika kamu menyimpang (dari jalan Allah) sesudah datang kepadamu bukti-bukti kebenaran, maka ketahuilah, bahwasanya Allah Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Bijaksana.
arabic: فَإِن زَلَلۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡكُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in zalaltum min baʿdi mā jāatkumu al-bayinātu fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
